title: Topic 006 Question 022
body: You plan to implement inside 365 E5 subscription.
You plan to implement insider risk management for users that manage sensitive data associated with a project.
You need to create a protection policy for the users. The solution must meet the following requirements:
•	Minimize the impact on users who are NOT part of the project.
options: From the Microsoft Entra admin center, create a security group.
From the Microsoft Purview compliance portal, create an insider risk management policy.
From the Microsoft Purview compliance portal, create a priority user group.
From the Microsoft Entra admin center, create a risky users policy.
